text:
@GovRicketts Not Reporting 

on 
MEAT PACKING PLANTS

Is inhumane,

It may be killing people,

And is SPREADING #Coronavirus 

In the USA ....

So cruel to NOT take 

proper measures

to protect workers, their families,

and the community
